name: Grilled Chicken Alfredo Flatbread Pizzas
author: KGora
summary: Flatbreads topped with chicken breast, mushrooms, and Alfredo sauce. Prepare ahead by thawing bread dough in the refrigerator overnight. This recipe was made in a Panasonic CIO.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed
1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese, divided
directions: Marinate chicken breast in Italian dressing for 10 minutes
Slice chicken thinly across the grain into pieces the width of thick bacon
Cut bread dough into 2 equal pieces
Cover with a little mozzarella cheese
Sprinkle remaining mozzarella cheese on top
Place 1 pizza in the Panasonic Countertop Induction Oven and press "Auto Cook
" Select the frozen pizza setting, 9-inch size
Allow pizza to cook until timer goes off, about 13 minutes
